MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA11 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Higher Lane and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:03PM on 20th October 2020.
